data.title: Waller CAD – Official Site
data.text:
TAX PAYMENTS CANNOT BE ACCEPTED AT WCAD.

Waller County Appraisal District has no authority to receive tax payments for any jurisdiction. All tax payments must be mailed or delivered to the tax collector for the jurisdiction that sent you the tax bill.Click on this link for a listing of the entities and their collectors. Since Waller CAD does not collect property taxes we do not have tax information (amount due…) on our website under property search. You must contact the tax collector(s) for this information.

Within this site you will find general information about the District and the ad valorem property tax system in Texas, as well as information regarding specific properties within the district.

Waller County Appraisal District is responsible for appraising all real and business personal property within Waller County. The district appraises property according to the Texas Property Tax Code and the Uniform Standards of Professional Appraisal Practices (USPAP).

Waller County Appraisal District is responsible for the fair market appraisal of properties for the following entities that levy property taxes:

COUNTY OF WALLER/WALLER CO FM HARRIS WALLER MUD #5 HEMPSTEAD INDEPENDENT SCHOOL DISTRICT HARRIS WALLER MUD #7 KATY INDEPENDENT SCHOOL DISTRICT SOUTHEAST REGIONAL MGMNT DIST ROYAL INDEPENDENT SCHOOL DISTRICT WALLER CO MUD #9B WALLER INDEPENDENT SCHOOL DISTRICT WALLER CO MUD #18 CITY OF BROOKSHIRE WALLER CO MUD #19 CITY OF HEMPSTEAD WALLER CO MUD #33 CITY OF KATY WALLER CO MUD #34A CITY OF PRAIRIE VIEW WALLER CO MUD #19 CITY OF WALLER WALLER CO MUD #33 WALLER HARRIS ESD 200 WALLER CO MUD #35 BROOKSHIRE KATY DRAINAGE DISTRICT WALLER CO MUD #37 BROOKSHIRE MUD WALLER CO MUD #38 KATY WEST MUNICIPAL UTILITY DISTRICT WALLER CO MUD #41 FORT BEND WALLER CO MUD #3 WALLER CO ROAD IMP DIST #1 FORT BEND WALLER CO MUD #3A WALLER CO IMP DISTRICT #2 HARRIS WALLER MUD #2 WALLER CO WATER CONTROL IMP DIST #3 HARRIS WALLER MUD #3 WILLOW CREEK FARMS MUD HARRIS WALLER MUD #4 WILLOW POINT MUD
